Sequence Information.Peptide Name: RG-29 (gecko cathelicidin, natural AMPs, reptiles, animals, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (45%) toTpen-cecR: 21%; A=K=G: 14%. GRAVY: -0.53; mol Wt: 3389.102; mol formula: C155H261N55O31; mol ex coeff: 11100.Activity: active against A. baumannii ATCC19606 (MIC 4.69 ug/ml), E. coli ATCC8739 (MIC 2.34 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa ATCC27853 (MIC 4.69 ug/ml), and S. aureus ATCC6538 (MIC 2.34 ug/ml). Warning: Non-standard assay.Structure:  random coil in aqueous solution and helical in 30 mM SDS.In vitro toxicity: showed minimal hemo.lytic till 100 ug/ml and little toxicity to HaCaT and HEK293 cells.
Literature Information.Author: Cai Y, Wang X, Zhang T, Yan A, Luo L, Li C, Tian G, Wu Z, Wang X, Shen D, Han Y, Zhang Z. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Rational Design of a Potent Antimicrobial Peptide Based on the Active Region of a Gecko Cathelicidin.
